first_para: Byron Magnus Faust Lloyd (born September 4 1958) is a Conservative Party politician and was elected as a South Wales West regional Assembly Member in the National Assembly for Wales at the May 2011 election.

full.extract: Byron Magnus Faust Lloyd (born September 4 1958) is a Conservative Party politician and was elected as a South Wales West regional Assembly Member in the National Assembly for Wales at the May 2011 election.
full.title: Byron Davies
